name.japanese: マリンフォード・オリス広場

description: The central plaza of Marineford where the main battle of the Summit War takes place. It's a massive open area surrounded by Marine facilities and the execution platform.

keyEvents.title: Whitebeard Readies Shockwave
keyEvents.description: Whitebeard commands his pirates and prepares a powerful shockwave attack in the plaza.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the scale of destruction possible in this battle zone.

keyEvents.title: Aokiji's Ice Ball vs Whitebeard
keyEvents.description: Aokiji attempts to freeze Whitebeard in the plaza using his Ice Ball technique.
keyEvents.significance: Major confrontation between Admiral and Yonko in the plaza.

keyEvents.title: Whitebeard vs Akainu Clash
keyEvents.description: The plaza becomes the battleground for an intense clash between Whitebeard and Akainu.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most destructive battles in the plaza.

statusHistory.reason: Main battlefield during the Summit War

name.japanese: マリンフォード・処刑台

description: The raised execution platform at Marineford where Portgas D. Ace is scheduled to be executed. It overlooks the Oris Plaza and serves as the focal point of the war.

keyEvents.title: Garp's Internal Conflict
keyEvents.description: Garp stands on the execution platform, visibly struggling with his duty as Sengoku notices his strange behavior.
keyEvents.significance: The platform becomes the symbol of Garp's impossible choice.

keyEvents.title: Garp Defends the Platform
keyEvents.description: Garp punches Marco away from the execution platform with devastating force.
keyEvents.significance: Garp actively defends the platform, making his choice clear.

keyEvents.title: Garp's Declaration
keyEvents.description: Garp declares that anyone who wants to pass must kill him first while standing guard at the platform.
keyEvents.significance: The platform represents the line Garp has chosen to defend.

statusHistory.reason: Ace's execution platform during the Summit War
